WebhookForm.instructions: ※Please enter your Discord Webhook URL. If left blank, notifications will be disabled.
WebhookForm.notificationIntervalInfo: ※The interval for receiving notifications (e.g., every 5 minutes).
WebhookForm.notificationCondition: ※Only tasks with a high priority score of 2 or higher (calculated based on remaining time and importance) will trigger a notification.
WebhookForm.updateSuccess: Webhook URL and notification interval have been updated.
WebhookForm.webhookRequirement: Note: Discord webhook settings can only be configured using Discord's web or desktop application.
WebhookForm.guideStep1: Choose a channel in your Discord server and click the edit icon
WebhookForm.guideStep3: Set a name and click 'Copy Webhook URL' to paste it here
